005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.List;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
024
025/**
026 * Implements the XPath 3.1
027 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-get">map:get</a>
028 * function.
029 */
030public final class MapGet {
031  private static final String NAME = "get";
032  @NonNull
033  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
034      .name(NAME)
035      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
036      .deterministic()
037      .contextIndependent()
038      .focusIndependent()
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("map")
041          .type(IMapItem.class)
042          .one()
043          .build())
044      .argument(IArgument.builder()
045          .name("key")
046          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
047          .one()
048          .build())
049      .returnType(IItem.class)
050      .returnZeroOrOne()
051      .functionHandler(MapGet::execute)
052      .build();
053
054  private MapGet() {
055    // disable construction
056  }
057
058  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
059  @NonNull
060  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
061      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
062      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
063      IItem focus) {
064    IMapItem<?> map = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
065    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
066
067    ICollectionValue value = get(map, key);
068    return value == null ? ISequence.empty() : value.asSequence();
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
073   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-get">map:get</a>.
074   *
075   * @param <V>
076   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
077   * @param map
078   *          the map of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
079   * @param key
080   *          the key for the item to retrieve
081   * @return the retrieved item
082   */
083  @Nullable
084  public static <V extends ICollectionValue> V get(
085      @NonNull IMapItem<V> map,
086      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
087    return map.get(key.asMapKey());
088  }
089}
